summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges for transportation and special handling, along with a summary of the shipment and payment instructions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the FedEx services.

persons.name: Lauren Kwinter
persons.context: Lauren Kwinter is mentioned as the sender of a package associated with the shipment detailed in the invoice.

persons.name: Joseph Experton
persons.context: Joseph Experton is noted as the recipient of the package sent by Lauren Kwinter.

connections.description: Lauren Kwinter sent a package to Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a sender-recipient relationship.
Lauren Kwinter is the sender of a package to Joseph Experton, establishing a sender-recipient relationship.

events.title: Package Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for delivery to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Package Delivery
events.description: The package sent by Lauren Kwinter was delivered to Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: The invoice is dated March 1, 2004, and is for FedEx services.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $30.56.
The package was picked up on February 18, 2004, and delivered on February 24, 2004.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge and a discount applied to the total charges.
The document contains multiple references to Jeffrey Epstein's address.
